title: Nvidia-Backed Perplexity (NVDA) Takes on Google with New AI-Powered Web Browser
summary: N Nvidia-backed Perplexity AI (NVDA) has introduced a new AI-powered web browser called Comet. Comet is a tool that turns entire browsing sessions into smooth, ongoing conversations. Users can ask questions, complete tasks, and conduct research through a single, intuitive interface.

title: NVDA: Nvidia Insider Just Offloads $35 Million Worth of Shares
summary: CEO Jen?Hsun Huang sold roughly $35.5 million worth of stock in multiple transactions, according to a 7 July SEC filing. Huang offloaded 225,000 shares at prices ranging from $153.04 to $160.94 per share.

title: SA Asks: What's the most attractive AI stock right now? (NVDA:NASDAQ)
summary: Yiannis Zourmpanos: Nebius Group sits at the intersection of the AI supercycle and undervalued. Michael Del Monte: The company is at the center of an AI revolution that is still underappreciated.

title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: AES, Nvidia, Bloom Energy, Verona Pharma and more
summary: Monster Beverage dropped nearly 3% after a downgrade from Rothschild & Co. Shares of Fair Isaac slid 5%, placing them on track for a second straight losing day. Merck bought U.K.-based Verona Pharma in a roughly $10 billion deal.
